tweets.text: #EDFKillingTunnels @hinkleypointc    will kill 182 million fish a year. Severn Estuary is breeding & nursery grounds for #UK #EU #Fish All water will pass through these two giant 3km cooling tunnels every year 60 years ->11 Billion dead fish. “Insignificant” to @EDF but not to us

Next band of weather coming in 😞

The ground is #saturated so levels are responding fast. Last weeks #water is still in the lower reaches of the #Severn too so you’re going hear us talking about multiple peaks.
